name: Save The Egg (Nexlate Games)
description:
Welcome To Save The Egg Game. We are Introduce 

The Best Egg Game With The Super Causal Adventure Experience.

~~~~ Game Machanics ~~~~

Eggs Will Fall From The Sky and 

You Have To Collect Them Into The Bucket. This Mean 

You Have to Save The Eggs

If You Hold The Right Side Then Your

Bucket Will Move to Right Side

If You Hold The Left Side Then Your

Bucket Will Move to Left Side

~~~~ Game Features ~~~~

-Save Eggs And Win Levels

-Cute Envoirment

-Beautiful Graphics

-Easy And Simple Gameplay

-Very Easy Controls

-Cute Sprits

-Many Levels With Adventure

-Casual And Simple Gameplay

-Casual Egg Game

-Casual Egg Game For All Ages

-Casual Egg Game For Kids And Teens

-Game For All Ages

-Best Arcade Egg Game

-Best Adventure Egg Game

-Arcade Egg Game

-Adventure Egg Game

-Best Casual Egg Game

-Best Egg Game

~~~~ Thanks Everyone ~~~~

Thanks For Downloding "Save The Egg Game"
